sense.definition: expressing location or arrival at a particular place or position (e.g., he is at the store)
in the direction of X2 (e.g., threw coins at the bottle)
in the direction of X2, specifically in the case of repetitive (and perhaps unsuccessful) actions (e.g., claw at the portrait)
expressing the time (X2) when an event takes place (e.g., happened at night)
indicating a position (X2) on a scale (e.g., room was at 100 degrees)
indicating the age (X2) of someone/something (e.g., was foolish at 17)
indicating the subject matter (X2) (often one that provokes a mental reaction or an expression indicative thereof) (X1) (e.g., angry at Joe)
expressing a relationship between an individual and a skill or a level of skill and the skill itself (e.g., good at singing)
indicating the target or goal (X2) of an attempt, action, thought, or plan (X1) (e.g., attempts as unification)
expressing a state, condition, or circumstance (X2) (often somewhat idiomatic) (e.g., they are at odds)
